name: Neon Block Classic
description:
How to play:
1: Drag the blocks to move them.
2: Try to create full lines on the grid vertically or horizontally.
3: The blocks can not be rotated.
4: Plan your moves carefully and test your logic and matching skills.

Features:
- Completely free to play.
- No life, stamina or energy, play as much as you want without waiting to recharge.
- Cool blocks and block animations
- Use your intelligence to get the highest score.
- Start your agile brain and challenge yourself.
